ngos.name: Smile Foundation
ngos.mission: Empowering underprivileged children and youth through education.
ngos.description: Smile Foundation works for the welfare of underprivileged children, their families, and the community, especially through education.

ngos.name: Child Rights and You (CRY)
ngos.description: CRY works to ensure that children get their basic rights to education, nutrition, and healthcare.

ngos.name: UNICEF India
ngos.mission: Advocating for the rights of children and youth.
ngos.description: UNICEF works with the government and other organizations to improve children's lives through health and education.
